00027                 return tmp;

00039         typedef float4  b3Float4;

00042         float b3Dot3F4(b3Float4ConstArg v0,b3Float4ConstArg v1)
00043         {
00044                 float4 a1 = b3MakeFloat4(v0.xyz,0.f);
00045                 float4 b1 = b3MakeFloat4(v1.xyz,0.f);
00046                 return dot(a1, b1);
00047         }
00048         b3Float4 b3Cross3(b3Float4ConstArg v0,b3Float4ConstArg v1)
00049         {
00050                 float4 a1 = b3MakeFloat4(v0.xyz,0.f);
00051                 float4 b1 = b3MakeFloat4(v1.xyz,0.f);
00052                 return cross(a1, b1);
00053         }

00063 inline bool b3IsAlmostZero(b3Float4ConstArg v)
00064 {
00065         if(b3Fabs(v.x)>1e-6 || b3Fabs(v.y)>1e-6 || b3Fabs(v.z)>1e-6)    
00066                 return false;
00067         return true;
00068 }

00071 inline int    b3MaxDot( b3Float4ConstArg vec, __global const b3Float4* vecArray, int vecLen, float* dotOut )
00072 {
00073     float maxDot = -B3_INFINITY;
00074     int i = 0;
00075     int ptIndex = -1;
00076     for( i = 0; i < vecLen; i++ )
00077     {
00078         float dot = b3Dot3F4(vecArray[i],vec);
00079             
00080         if( dot > maxDot )
00081         {
00082             maxDot = dot;
00083             ptIndex = i;
00084         }
00085     }
00086         b3Assert(ptIndex>=0);
00087     if (ptIndex<0)
00088         {
00089                 ptIndex = 0;
00090         }
00091     *dotOut = maxDot;
00092     return ptIndex;
00093 }
